mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD where USER_NICKNM=#{userNicknm} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT b.BOARD_NUM , b.USER_NICKNM , b.BOARD_SUBJECT , b.BOARD_CONTENT , b.BOARD_LIKECOUNT , b.BOARD_READCOUNT , b.BOARD_DATE , l.USER_ID FROM BOARD b JOIN BOARD_LIKE l on b.BOARD_NUM = l.BOARD_NUM where USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT p.PROD_L_CODE , p.PROD_L_PRODNM , p.PROD_L_PRICE , p.PROD_L_MAINIMG , l.USER_ID FROM PRODUCT_LIST p JOIN PRODUCT_LIKE l on p.PROD_L_CODE = l.PROD_L_CODE where USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY PROD_L_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as trnum ,l.ORD_L_CODE ,l.ORD_L_QUANTITY ,l.ORD_L_PRICE ,l.ORD_L_COUPONNUM ,l.ORD_DELIVERY_STATUS ,l.ORD_L_DELIV_NUMBER ,l.ORD_PURCHASESTATUS ,l.ORD_L_DATE ,l.ORD_L_NUM ,l.ORD_NUM ,b.ORD_COUPONDC ,b.ORD_FINALPRICE ,p.PROD_L_PRODNM ,p.PROD_L_MAINIMG FROM ORDER_LIST l join ORDER_BOARD b ON (l.ORD_L_NUM=b.NUM) JOIN PRODUCT_LIST p ON (l.ORD_L_CODE=p.PROD_L_CODE) WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0 AND l.ORD_L_USER= #{userId} AND date_format(l.ORD_L_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY l.ORD_L_DATE DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON( NUM ,COU_USER_ID ,COU_NUM ,COU_NM ,COU_DC ,COU_YN ,COU_DATE ) SELECT (SELECT NUM FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(NUM AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1 AS NUM FROM COUPON) A) ,#{couUserId} ,#{couNum} ,(SELECT COU_NM FROM COUPON_INFO WHERE COU_NUM=#{couNum}) ,(SELECT COU_DC FROM COUPON_INFO WHERE COU_NUM=#{couNum}) ,"Y" ,#{couDate} FROM COUPON_INFO WHERE COU_NUM = #{couNum}
mapper.select: SELECT NUM ,COU_USER_ID ,COU_NUM ,COU_NM ,round((1 - COU_DC)*100,0) as couDc ,COU_YN ,COU_DATE ,(SELECT COU_DET FROM COUPON_INFO ci WHERE ci.COU_NUM=cp.COU_NUM) as couDet FROM COUPON cp WHERE COU_USER_ID=#{couUserId}
